program.title: Activity Classification with CreateML using AirPod Pro
program.abstract: With the new AirPods Pro Motion API opens this year we can start collecting Core Motion data from AirPod Pro. Using the Core Motion data collected I am going to show how to create a model using CreateML to classify head motion e.g. shaking your head, nodding, or even exercise like a squad. I want to get everybody excited about AI.

speakers.name: Ethan Fan
speakers.bio: Cofounder of Vimo Labs. Our app Gymatic is the only Apple Watch app that Auto recognizes any gesture and Deep analysis for fitness and sports movements. SleepMatic till today is still one of the top paid health app in the US that track you sleep using Apple Watch. FowardSwift Speaker 2017.
